text: Adrien Bongiovanni (born 20 September 1999) is a Belgian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Den Bosch on loan from Monaco. ==Club career== ===Monaco=== Bongiovanni made his professional debut on 26 April 2017 in the Coupe de France semi-final against Paris Saint-Germain replacing Valère Germain in the 60th minute of a 5–0 away loss. ==International career== Bongiovanni was born in Belgium and is of Italian descent.
